text: jani lo ke duniyanum jivana phakata ramata-gamata, sanagara ane eka- bijamam ahankara ane dhana tatha santano babate eka bijana dekhadekhimam potane srestha batavavanum che, jevi rite ke varasada ane teni pedavara khedutone lubhave che, pachi jyare te suki padi jaya che to pila rangamam tame tene ju'o cho, pachi te cure cura tha'i jaya che. Ane akheratamam sakhata yatana ane allahani maphi ane rajamandi che, ane duniyanum jivana phakata dhoko ja che, te vagara kami nathi
